document_data.name: Naxamil
document_data.History:
Naxamil was born in [[Qoral]]. When the village grew into a large city, thanks to the estate of Governor [[Cordell]], he became one of the head workers involved in building warehouses.

However, in [[1370 DR]] Naxamil and two friends started a terrorist campaign trying to destroy the new settlement. They burned warehouses and freed some [[Payit (ethnicity)|Payit]] slaves. One night, one of Namaxil's group tried to kill Cordell. The assassin failed but managed to escape.
